sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. In a bowl, combine olive oil, minced garlic, lime juice, chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper. 2. Add chicken thighs to the bowl and marinate for 30. 3. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. 4. Add sliced bell pepper and onion to the skillet, cook until softened. 5. Remove vegetables from the skillet. 6. Add marinated chicken thighs to the skillet and cook until browned and cooked through. 7. Slice cooked chicken and serve with cooked vegetables and tortillas.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Mexican">07495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Chicken Thighs (4, boneless and skinless</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Chicken Fajitas</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 25g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 35g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Slice bell pepper and onion. 2. Mince garlic. 3. Juice lime.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b0ac87979795021069a3b6fce053af9f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
